alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Greene; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 4:31AM EDT until March 26 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Greene County in eastern North Carolina... Central Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... South central Martin County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 500 AM EDT. * At 429 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Farmville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Washington, Winterville, Ayden, Farmville, Bell Arthur, Pactolus, House, Black Jack, Bruce, Maury, Ormondsville, Roundtree, Lizzie, Old Ford, Pitt Greenville Airport, Dowdy Ficklen Stadium, East Carolina University, Chocowinity and Washington Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
